title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive real-time updates on my patients' vital signs and health metrics so that I can efficiently monitor their health status and provide timely interventions.

title: Real-Time Alerts for Patient Health Anomalies
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive real-time alerts for any significant changes in my patients' health metrics so that I can intervene promptly and ensure their well-being.

title: Secure Patient Data Access for Caregivers
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want secure access to my patients' health data so that I can effectively monitor their vital signs and provide timely interventions while respecting their privacy.

title: Intuitive Health Insights Dashboard for Caregivers
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want an intuitive health insights dashboard so that I can efficiently monitor my patients' health metrics and respond quickly to any anomalies.

title: User-Friendly Communication Features for Caregivers
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want user-friendly communication features in ALFRED so that I can easily connect with my patients and their families, ensuring timely updates and support for socially isolated individuals.

title: Training and Support for Effective Remote Monitoring
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want access to training and support resources for using the ALFRED system so that I can efficiently monitor my patients' health and provide the best possible care remotely.

title: Integration with Emergency Response for Patient Safety
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to integrate with emergency response services so that I can ensure my patients receive immediate assistance in case of emergencies.

title: Tailored Alerts for Remote Patient Monitoring
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive tailored alerts when my patients' vital signs indicate anomalies so that I can provide timely interventions and ensure their well-being even when I am not physically present.

title: Comprehensive Logging of Patient Care Activities
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to have a comprehensive log of my patients' care activities so that I can efficiently monitor their health status and provide timely interventions.

title: Feedback Mechanism for Enhancing Caregiver Interaction
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want a feedback mechanism that allows me to share observations and insights about my patients' health with the ALFRED system so that the platform can provide tailored suggestions and alerts for better care management.
